title: The Farmer was a fighting man
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Movietonenews
brief_description: A description of the extensive operations undertaken by Commonwealth and State authorities to prepare large tracts of country for the establishment of farms for ex-servicemen of World War II. Shows clearing and land reclamation in Western Australia, South Australia, Tasmania and at Loxton on the River Murray.
